title: How to Save a Document in a Windows Based System

steps.headline: Click File on the top left side of the window.
Get the "save in" drop box to open by clicking the little down arrow.
steps.description: Select the location where you want your file to save. Example: My Documents

steps.headline: , give your file a name by typing something in the "file name" field.

text: Click File on the top left side of the window. Then select "save as". Get the "save in" drop box to open by clicking the little down arrow. Select the location where you want your file to save. Example: My Documents , give your file a name by typing something in the "file name" field. Example: Research Paper Click save
sentences: Click File on the top left side of the window.
Get the "save in" drop box to open by clicking the little down arrow.
Select the location where you want your file to save.
Example: My Documents , give your file a name by typing something in the "file name" field.
